SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.blog_id, a.user_id, a.blog_desc, a.recommend, a.share_flag, a.tag_id_str, a.type_id, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.first_picture_addr, a.published, a.blog_title, a.blog_views, a.appreciation_flag, a.commentabled, a.blog_comments, b.nickname, b.head_portrait FROM t_blog a, t_user b WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id AND a.del_flag = 0 ) a
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT a.type_id, a.type_name, (SELECT count(b.type_id) FROM t_blog b WHERE a.type_id = b.type_id and del_flag='0' and published='1') blogNums FROM t_type a ORDER BY blogNums DESC, a.type_id ASC LIMIT #{topSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from t_blog where published='1' and del_flag='0' order by blog_views desc LIMIT #{topSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a.blog_id, a.user_id, a.blog_desc, a.recommend, a.share_flag, a.tag_id_str, a.type_id, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.first_picture_addr, a.published, a.blog_title, a.blog_views, a.appreciation_flag, a.commentabled, a.blog_comments, a.blog_content, a.blog_flag, b.nickname, b.head_portrait FROM t_blog a, t_user b WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id AND a.del_flag = 0 AND a.blog_id = #{blogId}

SELECT b.user_id userId, b.nickname nickname, b.head_portrait headPortrait, COUNT( 1 ) blogNums FROM t_blog a, t_user b WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id AND a.del_flag = 0 AND a.published = 1 GROUP BY b.user_id, b.head_portrait ORDER BY blogNums DESC LIMIT #{topSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
